name: Snake (itch) (friendpatine)
description:
SNAKE

A clone of the classic game Snake, presented with an old school Retro aesthetic!

Eat as much food as possible while avoiding the walls and your ever growing tail. Relive this classic game with a Retro style that will take you back to your go ol' Nokia 1110.

CONTROLS:

wasd/arrow keys to move

eat food to score

don't eat yourself or the walls
